attributes.action: Tony Blair to have Knight Companion of Most Noble Order of the Garter remove
attributes.additional_details: Request that under the circumstances that this is revoked -  immediately!
attributes.background:
Tony Blair is the least deserving person of any public honour, particularly anything awarded by Her Majesty the Queen. 
We petition the Prime Minister to petition parliament and Her Majesty to have this honour removed.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
